protocol.name: P-GSE24389-1
text: VALUE = RMA pre-normalised using Aloe_250.CDF and normalised to the median of the gene signal across all samples.

protocol.name: P-GSE24389-2
protocol.text: A mature Aloe plant obtained from a local garden centre, was grown in the laboratory at room temperature.

protocol.name: P-GSE24389-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the Qiagen Rneasy plant mini kit according to the manufactures' instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE24389-4
protocol.text: 250ng of total RNA was labelled using the Affymetrix 3' IVT express kit as per manufactures' instructions

protocol.name: P-GSE24389-5
protocol.text: Samples were hybridised at the NASC Microarray Core Facility according to manufacturer's instructions. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.

protocol.name: P-GSE24389-6
protocol.text: Array scanning was performed according to the manufacturer's instruction (Affymetrix) using an Affymetrix 3000 7G scanner.

protocol.name: P-GSE24389-7
protocol.text: The RNA data was analysed using the Genspring GX 11 Software (Agilent technologies) using the RMA probe summarisation algorithm, using a CDF file produced from the Aloe gDNA hybridisation result with a hybridisation threshold of 250. Each gene signal was then normalised to the median of the gene signal across all samples.

protocol.name: P-GSE24389-8
protocol.text: Genomic DNA was extracted using the Qiagen DNeasy plant mini kit according to the manufactures' instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE24389-9
protocol.text: 500ng of genomic DNA was labelled using the Invitrogen DNA labelling kit as per manufactures' instructions
